    • natsOpenCDXMessageService

      @Bean("nats") @Description("NATS implementation of the OpenCDXMessageService.") @Primary @ConditionalOnProperty(prefix="nats.spring", name="server") public OpenCDXMessageService natsOpenCDXMessageService(io.nats.client.Connection natsConnection, ObjectMapper objectMapper, OpenCDXCurrentUser openCDXCurrentUser, @Value("${spring.application.name}") String applicationName, io.micrometer.tracing.Tracer tracer)

      Parameters:
      natsConnection - NATS Connection
      objectMapper - Object Mapper to use.
      openCDXCurrentUser - Current User Service
      applicationName - Name of the service.
      tracer - Tracer to use.
